JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Housekeeper for sustainable hotel chain in Copenhagen
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Housekeeper - Danish work permit required!

Scandclean is looking for dedicated colleagues for the Housekeeping department in a sustainably-run hotel in Copenhagen.

You must be a team player and have passion for delivering a high quality service in a complex environment.

Job Overview

This position involves the following responsibilities in the housekeeping department:

  • Cleaning and preparing rooms
  • Cleaning of all guest and conference areas
  • Preparation and cleaning of trolleys and depots
  • Provide 5-star guest service

Requirements We expect from you, that you are:

  • Independent, but still a team player
  • Positive and stable
  • Effective, efficient and energetic
  • Careful and paying attention to details
  • Flexible and able to keep the overview during busy periods
  • Service minded both to guests and colleagues
  • Preferably you speak a minimum of basic english

You are, by nature, positive and see solutions and welcome a challenge. You understand how to maintain a high professional level and are proud of your profession.

We offer an attractive package with a good salary and pension incl. health package, social events and organic lunch. The position is min. 20 hours per week.

Danish work permit required!

We regularly invite candidates for interviews, so send your application and resume as soon as possible to info@scandclean.dk.

Scandclean is a Copenhagen-based cleaning company that operates solely in Guldsmeden Hotels.
